title: The pesticide treadmill increases pesticide use

content.question: Which of the following is the best illustration of the pesticide treadmill?

choices.label: Sequence of several pesticides used by farmers to maximize effectiveness
Increased use of pesticides to eradicate genetically resistant pests
Biomagnification of pesticides in the fatty tissue of primary consumers
Movement of pesticides following their percolation into the groundwater
Process that is used to manufacture pesticides

content.answer: Increased use of pesticides to eradicate genetically resistant pests
